text_sections.section_2: Statement of the University of Technology Nuremberg on Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DEI) (https://www.utn.de/en/2025/03/10/statement-of-the-university-of-technology-nuremberg-on-diversity-equity-and-inclusion-dei/)
text_sections.section_3: The University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) is unequivocally committed to respecting human dignity and the core values of Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DEI). We believe that a diverse, inclusive, and… …   (https://www.utn.de/en/2025/03/10/statement-of-the-university-of-technology-nuremberg-on-diversity-equity-and-inclusion-dei/) Read more about"Statement of the University of Technology Nuremberg on Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DEI)" (https://www.utn.de/en/2025/03/10/statement-of-the-university-of-technology-nuremberg-on-diversity-equity-and-inclusion-dei/)
text_sections.section_4: Statement by the University of Technology Nuremberg against anti-Semitism (https://www.utn.de/en/2024/09/30/statement-by-the-university-of-technology-nuremberg-utn-against-anti-semitism/)
text_sections.section_5: With this statement, the UTN expresses that we condemn anti-Semitism, discrimination and racism in all forms, that we give them no space and that we actively act against them. We expressly support the “Resolution for Respect at Bavarian Universities and Against Discrimination, Racism and Anti-Semitism” in all its parts. …   (https://www.utn.de/en/2024/09/30/statement-by-the-university-of-technology-nuremberg-utn-against-anti-semitism/) Read more about"Statement by the University of Technology Nuremberg against anti-Semitism" (https://www.utn.de/en/2024/09/30/statement-by-the-university-of-technology-nuremberg-utn-against-anti-semitism/)
